name: Ext_R5_ElementDefinition_sl_di_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator.type for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ElementDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: How the element value is interpreted when discrimination is evaluated.
element.comment: `ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator.type` maps to R4B `ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: How the element value is interpreted when discrimination is evaluated.
element.comment: `ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator.type` maps to R4B `ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: How an element value is interpreted when discrimination is evaluated.
